messages.title: ECONOMIC STABILITY AND JOBS
messages.content: Theresa discusses strong economic stability and job growth, achievement in creating jobs, and intentions to continue economic progress.

messages.title: EXPERIENCE AND TRACK RECORD
messages.content: Highlighting 12 years of campaigning for local issues such as the economy, healthcare, and local services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to fostering economic stability and growth, creating jobs, and sustaining public finances.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa has a strong interest in Brexit, wanting to make it a success.
issues.economy: Discusses the importance of economic stability and the track record of job creation.
issues.health: Pledges to fund the NHS, schools and local public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Theresa Villiers has been standing up for Barnet for 12 years, campaigning on the issues that matter.

politicalExperience.achievements: Working on key local issues such as economy, healthcare, transportation, and local services.

images.caption: Pictures of Theresa Villiers engaging with the community and performing her duties.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a personal endorsement and message from Prime Minister Theresa May, emphasizing Theresa Villiers' role and calling for support.
